ARABIC: إِن كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً فَإِذَا هُمْ خَٰمِدُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: It was but one Great Blast and they were extinct.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: There was just one blast, and they were extinguished.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: There was but a single Blast and suddenly they became silent and still.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It was only a single blast which made them extinct.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: It was just one scream, and with it they were extinguished.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: It was but one Sayhah and lo! they (all) were still.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: It was naught but a single cry, and lo! they were still.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: It was only one Cry and lo, they were silent and still.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: It was but one Shout, and lo! they were extinct.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: it was but one great blast and they fell down lifeless.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: It was but one shout, and lo! they were extinct.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: It was but a single Cry, and, behold, they were stilled [like burnt ashes]!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: It was no more than a single mighty Blast, and behold! they were (like ashes) quenched and silent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: It was but one Saihah (shout, etc.) and lo! They (all) were silent (dead-destroyed).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: It was only one Shout and they were silent, still.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: It was just one Cry, and they were stilled.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: It was not but one shout, and immediately they were extinguished.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [36:29] It, their punishment, was but one Cry — Gabriel gave a cry to them — and lo! they were extinguished, silent, dead.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (It was but one Shout) from Gabriel; Gabriel took hold of the sides of the door and cried one single cry, (and lo! they were extinct) they were dead without any motion in them.
